aws_db_snapshot.description: Manages a RDS database instance snapshot.

db_instance_identifier.description: The DB Instance Identifier from which to take the snapshot.

allocated_storage.description: Specifies the allocated storage size in gigabytes (GB).

availability_zone.description: Specifies the name of the Availability Zone the DB instance was located in at the time of the DB snapshot.

db_snapshot_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB snapshot.

encrypted.description: Specifies whether the DB snapshot is encrypted.

engine.description: Specifies the name of the database engine.

engine_version.description: Specifies the version of the database engine.

iops.description: Specifies the Provisioned IOPS (I/O operations per second) value of the DB instance at the time of the snapshot.

kms_key_id.description: The ARN for the KMS encryption key.

license_model.description: License model information for the restored DB instance.

option_group_name.description: Provides the option group name for the DB snapshot.

source_db_snapshot_identifier.description: The DB snapshot Arn that the DB snapshot was copied from. It only has value in case of cross customer or cross region copy.

source_region.description: The region that the DB snapshot was created in or copied from.

status.description: Specifies the status of this DB snapshot.

storage_type.description: Specifies the storage type associated with DB snapshot.

vpc_id.description: Specifies the storage type associated with DB snapshot.
